title: How browser render’s a webpage
description: End to End walkthrough of how browsers render a web page from downloading data packets to rendering pixels on the screen. Technically this entire process is called, Critical Rendering Path (CRP).

title: Dynamic Image Generation using Edge Functions
description: Explore how to leverage edge functions for on-the-fly image generation, optimizing performance and scalability.
imageText: Dynamic Image Generation using Edge Functions

title: Getting into Walmart Global Tech
description: Explore the opportunities and challenges of starting a career at Walmart Global Tech.
